Name: Triple Orange
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This aperitif cocktail has a trio of orange flavours with bitter liqueur adding character and balance.
Nutrition: One serving of Triple Orange contains 188 calories
